text:
How observant you are!

Raskolnikov smiles awkwardly, avoiding eye contact.  

Raskolnikov: I suppose there were many pledges...  

Porfiry: You're the only one who hasn’t come forward.  

---

Raskolnikov's anger builds, tone shifting sharply.  

Raskolnikov: I am not pale at all!  

Razumihin: He was unconscious and delirious yesterday!  

Porfiry: Really delirious? You don’t say so!  

---

Raskolnikov snaps, frustration boiling over.  

Raskolnikov: Nonsense! Don’t you believe it!

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov struggles with his emotions and the perception of his health while conversing with Porfiry and Razumihin.
